name: Dual Ship
description:
a local multiplayer space shooter game where 2 players control 2 different ships but when both ships collide with each other it will do a fusion and become one big ship, both players must control the big ship together.

your goal is to get a score as high as possible and if you don't have a friend to play with you can use both of your hands to control 2 players.

Important: if you get a problem while playing in the web version considering download the game below for the best experience.

thanks to JJ for creating the music.

all assets were created during the jam period.
